content: I'm getting brand new LOINCs for the vitals panel. Rob H informed me is breaking the build. How do we apply that? Assuming has to be coordinated with the terminology server.
yes I think so.. Two new panel loincs just for the profile I applied the one
well, I can support a pre-release code.
I see it got removed, but it doesn't need to be if it's the right code
don't mind adding it back - just want to fix the build for now
that wasn't what was breaking the build, and you can add it back now
I had an error explicitly due to the LOINC code - I agree the DosageInstruction error was there, too
complained that the code wasn't in the LOINC code system
Rob I can reapply waiting for another code anyway and is in my local build
I have to explicitly add the pre-release loinc codes to build\source\loinc\loinc.xml
OK I'll let you know as soon as I hear from Swapna

@GG New LOINCs ( pre-publsh ) for vitals panel:

  • 85353-1 Vital Signs Panel
  • 85354-9 Blood pressure panel with all children optional
Can you add them to the terminology server? let me know when is done so I can update the examples.
and I know that last name is goofy but all the good names were taken and is 4 component panel including diastolic and systolic.
